info: The project aims to promote balanced and environmentally sustainable urbanization, and to improve living conditions in Tianshui, a second-tier city in Gansu province, PRC. It will support the restructuring and expansion of the Qinzhou district heating network; construction of urban roads and bridges, and related services such as better flood control; and stronger urban management capacity.
name: GANSU TIANSHUI URBAN INFRASTRUCTURE DEVELOPMENT PRJCT
